verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> hath he quickened, who were <S%G5607><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> in trespasses <S%G3900><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> in time past <S%G4218><s%> ye walked <S%G4043><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> course <S%G165><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> prince <S%G758><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> air, <S%G109><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> that now worketh <S%G1754><s%> <S%G3568><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> children <S%G5207><s%> of disobedience: <S%G543><s%>

Among <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> had our conversation <S%G390><s%> in times past <S%G4218><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> fulfilling <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> desires <S%G2307><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> mind; <S%G1271><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> by nature <S%G5449><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> of wrath, <S%G3709><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> others. <S%G3062><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who is <S%G5607><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G848><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> love <S%G26><s%> wherewith <S%G3739><s%> he loved <S%G25><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> when we <S%G2248><s%> were <S%G5607><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> in sins, <S%G3900><s%> hath quickened us together <S%G4806><s%> with Christ, by <S%G5547><s%> (grace <S%G5485><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> saved;) <S%G4982><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> hath raised us up together, <S%G4891><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> made us sit together <S%G4776><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heavenly <S%G2032><s%> places in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ages <S%G165><s%> to come <S%G1904><s%> he might show <S%G1731><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> exceeding <S%G5235><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his kindness <S%G5544><s%> toward <S%G1909><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> by grace <S%G5485><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> ye saved <S%G4982><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith; <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> yourselves: <S%G5216><s%> it is the <S%G3588><s%> gift <S%G1435><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>
Not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> should boast. <S%G2744><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> his <S%G846><s%> workmanship, <S%G4161><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> good <S%G18><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath before ordained <S%G4282><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we should walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> remember, <S%G3421><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> being in time past <S%G4218><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are called <S%G3004><s%> Uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> that which is called <S%G3004><s%> the Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> made by hands; <S%G5499><s%>

That <S%G3754><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> ye were <S%G2258><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> being aliens <S%G526><s%> from the <S%G3588><s%> commonwealth <S%G4174><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strangers <S%G3581><s%> from the <S%G3588><s%> covenants <S%G1242><s%> of promise, <S%G1860><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> hope, <S%G1680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without God <S%G112><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world: <S%G2889><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> who sometimes were <S%G5607><s%> <S%G4218><s%> far off <S%G3112><s%> are made <S%G1096><s%> nigh <S%G1451><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> who hath made <S%G4160><s%> both <S%G297><s%> one, <S%G1520><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hath broken down <S%G3089><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> middle wall <S%G3320><s%> of partition <S%G5418><s%> between us;

Having abolished <S%G2673><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G848><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> enmity, <S%G2189><s%> even the <S%G3588><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> of commandments <S%G1785><s%> contained in <S%G1722><s%> ordinances; <S%G1378><s%> for to <S%G2443><s%> make <S%G2936><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> of twain <S%G1417><s%> <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> so making <S%G4160><s%> peace; <S%G1515><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> that he might reconcile <S%G604><s%> both <S%G297><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> cross, <S%G4716><s%> having slain <S%G615><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> enmity <S%G2189><s%> thereby: <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and preached <S%G2097><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> which were afar off, <S%G3112><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to them that were nigh. <S%G1451><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> we both <S%G297><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> access <S%G4318><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Now <S%G686><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> strangers <S%G3581><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> foreigners, <S%G3941><s%> but <S%G235><s%> fellow citizens <S%G4847><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the household <S%G3609><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

And are built <S%G2026><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> foundation <S%G2310><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prophets, <S%G4396><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> the chief corner <S%G204><s%> stone;

In <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> building <S%G3619><s%> fitly framed together <S%G4883><s%> groweth <S%G837><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> a holy <S%G40><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> are builded together <S%G4925><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a habitation <S%G2732><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
